movie.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In

movie.title: Borderlands
movie.category: Action, Science Fiction, Comedy, Adventure, Thriller
movie.description: Returning to her home planet, an infamous bounty hunter forms an unexpected alliance with a team of unlikely heroes. Together, they battle monsters and dangerous bandits to protect a young girl who holds the key to unimaginable power.

movie.title: Despicable Me 4
movie.description: Gru and Lucy and their girls—Margo, Edith and Agnes—welcome a new member to the Gru family, Gru Jr., who is intent on tormenting his dad. Gru also faces a new nemesis in Maxime Le Mal and his femme fatale girlfriend Valentina, forcing the family to go on

movie.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
movie.description: After a family tragedy, three generations of the Deetz family return home to Winter River. Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life is turned upside down when her teenage daughter, Astrid, accidentally opens the portal to the Afterlife.

movie.title: Trap
movie.description: A father and teen daughter attend a pop concert, where they realize they're at the center of a dark and sinister event.

movie.title: Twisters
movie.description: As storm season intensifies, the paths of former storm chaser Kate Carter and reckless social-media superstar Tyler Owens collide when terrifying phenomena never seen before are unleashed. The pair and their competing teams find themselves squarely in the

movie.title: Beetlejuice
movie.description: A newly dead New England couple seeks help from a deranged demon exorcist to scare an affluent New York family out of their home.

movie.title: The Union
movie.description: A New Jersey construction worker goes from regular guy to aspiring spy when his long-lost high school sweetheart recruits him for an espionage mission.

movie.title: The Killer
movie.description: Zee is a feared contract killer known as "the Queen of the Dead," but when she refuses to murder a young blind woman, she finds herself hunted both by criminal colleagues and a determined police detective.

movie.title: Kill

movie.title: Gunner
movie.description: While on a camping trip in order to reconnect, war veteran Colonel Lee Gunner must save his two sons from a gang of violent bikers when they're kidnapped after accidentally stumbling upon to a massive drug operation.

movie.title: Alien: Romulus
movie.description: While scavenging the deep ends of a derelict space station, a group of young space colonizers come face to face with the most terrifying life form in the universe.

movie.title: It Ends with Us
movie.description: When a woman's first love suddenly reenters her life, her relationship with a charming, but abusive neurosurgeon is upended, and she realizes she must learn to rely on her own strength to make an impossible choice for her future.

movie.title: Longlegs
movie.description: FBI Agent Lee Harker is assigned to an unsolved serial killer case that takes an unexpected turn, revealing evidence of the occult. Harker discovers a personal connection to the killer and must stop him before he strikes again.

movie.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
movie.description: Inside of his book, adventurous Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the physical world, Harold finds he has a lot to learn about real life.

movie.title: Jackpot!

movie.title: Saving Bikini Bottom: The Sandy Cheeks Movie
movie.description: When Bikini Bottom is scooped from the ocean, scientific squirrel Sandy Cheeks and her pal SpongeBob SquarePants saddle up for Texas to save their town.

movie.title: Untamed Royals
movie.description: A group of wealthy teenagers commit crimes that escalate from petty mischief to dangerous plots, causing chaotic consequences — but not for themselves.

movie.title: The Garfield Movie
